title: Spirited Away by the Rain Woman Youkai
description: The fearsome Rain Woman youkai finds a little boy to haunt, but finds in him more than what she bargained for: A little kernel in her heart.

altTitles.ja-ro: Youkai Ame Onna ni yoru Kamigakushi

altTitles.ja: 妖怪雨女による神隠し
